content: That's really helpful. I think I need to work on my active listening skills, especially when I'm talking to someone I'm close to. I tend to zone out and start thinking about my response instead of fully listening to what they're saying. Speaking of which, I've been trying to be more mindful in my daily activities, especially since I started attending the Buddhist meditation sessions at the Dhamma Center on Tuesdays and Thursdays to improve my mindfulness practice. Do you have any advice on how to incorporate mindfulness into my daily commute? I usually take the bus to work and it's a pretty long ride.
